metadata.name: CRYPTOBUBBLE 10 - THE GIANT ISOPOD #1/5
metadata.description:
Robert Staudingers first apperance in the NFT space is a series 
of highly detailed photographic works in an amazing still life quality.  
shown in several exhibitions, each of these stunning works expose a unique moment:

Robert Staudingers Bubbles are floating, sensitive objects wich only exist  
for the very moment of its creation. 
Their appearance can not be reenacted under any circumstances.  
A truly non fungible moment - captured and conserved.

This NFT collection is accompanied by their physical counterparts and  
the CRYPTOBUBBLE NFTs come with a deal: 
it is possible to redeem a physical framed print of a CRYPTOBUBBLE of your choice by the burn of ANY 4 CRYPTOBUBBLE NFT’s  
-see nft.robertstaudinger.com for claiming availability-  
(„any 4“ means: four pieces CRYPTOBUBBLE Tokens, regardless their appearance).  
The NFTs of the CRYPTOBUBBLES Seasons 1,2 and 3 are combinable and any 4  NFTs can be used to claim any available physical print. 
(according to last possible claim date and physical size in the token metadata)

please contact crypto@robertstaudinger.com to start the redeem process.
